text: it is important for candidates to
understand the leadership principles as
part of their preparation for the
interview it allows them to demonstrate
these behaviors through their examples
[Music]
hi i'm alin i'm a recruiting manager at
amazon web services my team and i
recruit for the commercial business with
a particular focus on non-technical
roles some candidates ask me what
qualities and skills will help me to
have a rewarding career at amazon web
services i would advise candidates to
research about aws go beyond the
fundamentals and the benefits of aws
really seek to understand the services
that you're interested in and how these
can benefit customers
one of the ways to understand aws
culture is to watch our aws builder
stories these videos featuring our
builders will give you insight into our
culture how we work and the day-to-day
lives here at aws
when i was preparing for my own
interview i reflected my past and
current experiences and extracted what
would apply to the leadership principles
amazon's leadership principles are a set
of standards that all amazonians aspire
to
they are ingrained in our culture and
clearly explain the kind of behaviors
that we value i love the diversity here
at aws
it is not limited to just gender
diversity but its cultural diversity
multi-generational diversity and more
if you are looking for a meaningful
career come join us at aws
